n0:createSxmlObject.n0:source: <VIEW xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/ku" version="1.0"> <SCHEMA>APP_CORE</SCHEMA> <NAME>UBS_ML</NAME> <DEFAULT_COLLATION>USING_NLS_COMP</DEFAULT_COLLATION> <COL_LIST> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_ID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_UP_ID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>DAY_OF_WEEK</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_CL_ID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_CW_ID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_PARKING_AVAIL</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_EVCHARGING_AVAIL</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_BIKERACK_AVAIL</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_LOCKER_AVAIL</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_TRAVEL_MEANS</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_TRAVEL_TIME</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_TEMP</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>WEATHER_CODE</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_EVENTS_ONSITE</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_EVENTS_VIRTUAL</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_EVENTS_OFFISTE</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_EVENTS_PERSONAL</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_NUMBER_OF_FRIENDS</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UBS_ACCEPTED</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> </COL_LIST> <SUBQUERY>SELECT ubs_id , ubs_up_id , to_number(to_char(ubs_date,'D')-1) as day_of_week , ubs_cl_id , ubs_cw_id , ubs_parking_avail , ubs_evcharging_avail , ubs_bikerack_avail , ubs_locker_avail , ubs_travel_means , ubs_travel_time , ubs_temp , case ubs_weather when 'Sunny' then 3 when 'Clouds' then 2 when 'Snow' then 1 when 'Rain' then 0 else 0 end as weather_code , ubs_events_onsite , ubs_events_virtual , UBS_EVENTS_OFFISTE , ubs_events_personal , ubs_number_of_friends , ubs_accepted FROM app_core.user_booking_suggestions where ubs_date <trunc(current_date)</SUBQUERY> </VIEW>
